label: 板東
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the term means “east of the (Ashigara and Usui) passes” and thus denotes the ten provinces from Sagami eastward in the Tôkaidô circuit and from Kôzuke eastward in the Tôsandô circuit.
